successes.title: Splash Drone a Waterproof Drone with Autonomous Features
successes.description: Splash Drone a waterproof drone with live video feed, payload release mechanism, emergency flare system and camera stabilization gimbal

Pledges.description: A big thank you! Every supporter at this level will be placed on the credits page of people that believed in the Splash Drone.
Thanks you for believing: You also get immortalized on the credit page and to thank you, we'll send you an awesome Splash Drone Pilot T-Shirt
Waterproof Camera Gimbal for the GoPro 3 and 4. Comes with the gimbal, camera case and back connector for live video output directly from the GoPro

Splash Drone Accessory Pack: Your commitment to the success of the Splash Drone is amazing! Your reward consists of 4 Splash Drone carbon fiber self tightening propellers, two Splash Drone batteries, and a 7 inch video receiver monitor.
THE DIY KIT. You get the Splash Drone frame, four motors, four ESCs, the power distribution board, landing gear and four self tightening props.
READY TO FLY EARLY BIRD: You've just put yourself at the top of the list to receive the Splash Drone before everyone else.

Comes with everything you need to get in the air the moment you get it. Remote control, self tightening props, travel case, Camera Gimbal, Integrated video transmitter, payload release mechanism, emergency flare kit, battery, smart charger and manual.
All this for only $799 instead of the $1199 planned for retail.

READY TO FLY:
Comes with everything you need to get in the air the moment you get it. Remote control, self tightening props, travel case, Camera Gimbal, Integrated video transmitter, payload release mechanism, emergency flare kit, battery, smart charger and manual.

RTF Standard Version plus Accessory Pack. Comes with everything you need to get in the air the moment you get it. Remote control, self tightening props, travel case, Camera Gimbal, Integrated video transmitter, payload release mechanism, emergency flare kit, battery, smart charger and manual.

PLUS
4 extra Splash Drone carbon fiber self tightening propellers, two Splash Drone batteries, and a 7 inch video receiver monitor.
